name: Pikmin 3 Deluxe
overview: Pikmin 3 Deluxe is an enhanced port of the 2013 Wii U game Pikmin 3 for the Nintendo Switch. The game was released on October 30th 2020. This edition includes all the DLCs new features such as new missions featuring Olimar and Louie, as well as a brand new co-op mode.
